item.title: Phong Reflection Model Simulator(PRMS)
item.description: Phong Reflection Model Simulator(PRMS) Phong Reflection Model Simulator is a simple 3D graphics simulator written in C++ and OpenGL. It is a brief program that simulates how phong reflection models work.
